LearningPathwayTemplateItem.name: LearningPathwayTemplateItem
LearningPathwayTemplateItem.description: Represents a requirement with completion details in the Learning Pathway Template.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency.

Duration.description: The allocated length of time for the Learning Pathway Template Item.

DurationUnit.description: Specifies the unit of measurement for the duration.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LearningId.description: The Learning associated with the Learning Pathway Template Item.

LearningPathwayTemplateId.description: The Learning Pathway Template that contains the Learning Pathway Template Item.

LearningProgramPlanRequirementId.description: The Learning Program Plan Requirement that's fulfilled by the the Learning Pathway Template Item.

Name.description: The name of the Learning Pathway Template Item.

Season.description: Specifies the season in which the Learning Pathway Template Item is taken.

SequenceNumber.description: The display position of the Learning Pathway Template Item.

Type.description: Specifies the type of Learning Pathway Template Item.

Year.description: Specifies the year in which the Learning Pathway Template Item is taken.
